snippet: As the Rockets went to Madison Square Garden, Kevin McHale was wrestling with the death of his daughter, and Jeremy Lin was revisiting the primary site of last season’s heroics.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column; Houston Rockets coach Kevin McHale, who displayed significant emotion during recent game against Boston Celtics following school shooting in Newtown, Conn, wrestles with the death of his daughter as team travels to Madison Square Garden to face the New York Knicks; Knicks drop their first home game of 2012 season as Rockets win, 109-96, behind guard Jeremy Linn's 22 points.
lead_paragraph: As the Rockets went to Madison Square Garden, Kevin McHale was wrestling with the death of his daughter, and Jeremy Lin was revisiting the primary site of last season’s heroics.

headline.seo: Kevin McHale and Jeremy Lin Face Emotional Times
headline.main: Emotional Times for McHale and Lin
headline.print_headline: Emotional Times For McHale and Lin
